overview: Produced by The Commonwealth Film Unit 1957. Directed by Richard Mason. Twenty miles of sea and sand on the coast of southern Queensland. The beaches between Coolangatta and Surfer's Paradise are known as the Gold Coast. Here, where it is always summer, there is an all year playground and tourist resort. One of Australia's most popular travel destinations. Shot in Vistarama and Eastmancolour.
title: Queensland Playground [Gold Coast]
